mapper.update: update tl_school_educational_administration set class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cource = #{cource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teachername = #{teachername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classname = #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, schoolname = #{schoolname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where cource_ID = #{courceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select cource_ID, class_id, cource, teachername, classname, start_time, end_time, schoolname, create_time from tl_school_educational_administration where cource_ID = #{courceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select schoolname, classname, (start_time,'yyy-mm-dd'), ((start_time,'HH:mm')-(end_time,'HH:mm')), cource, teachername from tl_school_educational_administration
mapper.insert: insert into tl_school_educational_administration( schoolname, classname, (start_time,'yyy-mm-dd'), ((start_time,'HH:mm')-(end_time,'HH:mm')), cource, teachername) values ((schoolname), (classname), (start_time,'yyy-mm-dd'),(start_time,'HH:mm'), (end_time,'HH:mm'), (cource), (teachername))
mapper.update: update tl_school_educational_administration set schoolname = #{schoolname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classname = #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time,'yyy-mm-dd' start_time,'HH:mm' end_time,'HH:mm' cource = #{cource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teachername = #{teachername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
